name: OverLaw
description:
Done for our first year in STMN P4 at ENJMIN CNAM in Angoulême.

This is a multiplayer 3d game made with unity with third person camera. You can choose team Cops or team Thieves and play in a little city. Cops must catch thieves and thieves must run away in a limited time round. Winner is the team who win 3 rounds.
